data_table.description: Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD0C
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q0c. Are you able to answer questions about subject memory and daily functioning before his/her death? [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD1
variable.description: Background. Q1. What was your relationship to subject? [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD2
variable.description: Background. Q2. Years known subject [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD3
variable.description: Background. Q3. How often see subject [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]
variable.value: Every day or every other day
Between one and three times a month
A few times a year or less often

variable.name: DRD4
variable.description: Memory. Q4. Consistent changes [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD4A
variable.description: Memory. Q4a. Consistent Changes [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD5
variable.description: Memory. Q5. Repeat questions [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD6
variable.description: Memory. Q6. Forget conversations [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD7
variable.description: Memory. Q7. Time looking [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD8
variable.description: Memory. Q8. Forget appointments [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD9
variable.description: Memory. Q9. Keeping track of current events [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD10
variable.description: Memory. Q10. Before he/she died, did subject forget names of close friends or relative? [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD11
variable.description: Orientation. Q11. Before he/she died, do you think that subject had more trouble knowing the exact day of the week and date (time orientation)? [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD12
variable.description: Orientation. Q12. Before he/she died, did subject have trouble with directions in familiar areas such as specific neighborhood? [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD13
variable.description: Judgment and Problem Solving. Q13. Handling unexpected problems [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD14
variable.description: Judgment and Problem Solving. Q14. Money ability [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD15
variable.description: Judgment and Problem Solving. Q15. Financial ability [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD16
variable.description: Judgment and Problem Solving. Q16. Necessary chores [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD17
variable.description: Community Affairs. Q17. Outside activities [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD18
variable.description: Community Affairs. Q18. Shopping ability [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD19
variable.description: Community Affairs. Q19. Unsafe practices [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD20
variable.description: Home and Hobbies. Q20. Household chores [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD21
variable.description: Home and Hobbies. Q21. Using household appliances [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD22
variable.description: Home and Hobbies. Q22. Interest in hobbies [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD23
variable.description: Home and Hobbies. Q23. Trouble heating water [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD24
variable.description: Home and Hobbies. Q24. Trouble preparing meals [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD25
variable.description: Personal Care. Q25. Personal hygiene [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD26
variable.description: Personal Care. Q26. Bladder control [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD26A
variable.description: Personal Care. Q26a. In the 12 months before he/she died, had subject had any incontinence, or accidents with subject bladder or bowels? [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD27
variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q27. Medications for memory [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD28
variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q28. Did he/she ever have a stroke? [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q28a. Problems before stroke [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD28B
variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q28b. Problems after stroke [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q29a. Dementia [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD29B
variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q29b. Alzheimer [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q29c. Vascular dementia or hardening [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.name: DRD29D
variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q29d. Mild Cognitive Impairment (or MCI)? [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q29e. Parkinson [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q29f. Brain tumor [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q29g. Others [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]

variable.description: Other Neurologic History. Q29g1. Others. If yes, please list [Dementia Rating Interview Deceased Participant]
